data.html:
Partner with Numeral

If you’re an accounting firm, a fractional CFO, an ecommerce agency, or a software provider, and you’d like to refer clients to Numeral, we’d love to partner with you.

January 1, 2025

data.html:
<style>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {
  animation: marquee 75s linear infinite;
}

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group.small {
  animation: marquee 140s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {

}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

data.html:
Why Numeral?

You want the best for your clients. Brands like Grüns, Ridge, Graza, and Immi already trust Numeral for sales tax compliance.

Become a partner

White glove support

Expert guidance every step of the way. Chat with us, send an email, or give us a call anytime.

Simple pricing

No long-term contract needed. Clients pay for registration and filing.

Virtual mailboxes

We scan, read, and respond to all your sales tax mail from state and local governments.

Monitor nexus thresholds

Numeral simplifies tracking by aggregating transactions from multiple billing systems into a clear, consolidated dashboard.

Robust integrations

Straightforward integrations with Shopify, Stripe, QuickBooks, and so many more.

Our guarantee

We guarantee your sales tax is filed on time, or we’ll pay your penalties and interest charges.

Intelligent workflows for registration, filing, and remittance—backed by white-glove customer support. Our team works closely with partners to deliver an elegant end-to-end experience.

data.html:
Monitor and register
File and remit
Calculate and collect
Manage expemptions

Monitor and register

Numeral aggregates your transactions and tracks sales thresholds, transaction counts, and physical presence.

Identify where you have tax liability and automatically register when you exceed a threshold or establish nexus. Even better, turn on Autoregister and automatically register in new states when needed.

File and remit

Filing monthly or quarterly? Expanding into a new state?

Numeral prepares and files your sales tax returns, integrating directly with your billing systems to calculate taxes across all jurisdictions.

We guarantee on-time filing, or we cover your penalties and interest.

Calculate and collect

Accurate rates, anywhere, instantly.

Calculate rates based on your customer’s location with granularity, including state, county, city, and district-level accuracy. Leverage our developer-friendly API directly, or use one of our integrations to get started in a snap!

Manage exemptions

Protect your business and prove compliance during audits by verifying your customers’ exemption certificates.

Collect, validate, and verify certificates while allowing customers to apply them at checkout. Numeral’s tools streamline certificate collection, storage, renewals, and validation, making compliance easy.

Simple integrations and end-to-end tax support as your business grows.

Filing monthly or quarterly? Expanding into a new state?

data.html:
We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
,
Founder, immi

I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.

Jesse Hiss
,
Founder, Fresh Sends

It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.

Adrian Zhang
,
Co-founder, The Woobles

As a founder, sales tax for my SaaS business was the last thing I wanted to think about. Numeral made it dead simple for Archive to stay compliant across multiple jurisdictions. Plus, their developer experience is thoughtful and built with craft.

Paul Benigeri
,
CEO, Archive

Numeral tailors its solution to each client’s needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.

Jason Wong
,
Founder, Doe Lashes

Sales tax compliance is a consistent frustration for my Series A & B SaaS clients. As a busy CFO, I want to spend my energy on strategic work, not compliance. With Numeral, I can delegate away the minutia of state tax compliance.

Hari Seshadri
,
CEO, Fractional

data.html:
Monitor and register
File and remit
Calculate and collect
Manage expemptions

Monitor and register

Numeral aggregates your transactions and tracks sales thresholds, transaction counts, and physical presence.

Identify where you have tax liability and automatically register when you exceed a threshold or establish nexus. Even better, turn on Autoregister and automatically register in new states when needed.

File and remit

Filing monthly or quarterly? Expanding into a new state?

Numeral prepares and files your sales tax returns, integrating directly with your billing systems to calculate taxes across all jurisdictions.

We guarantee on-time filing, or we cover your penalties and interest.

Calculate and collect

Accurate rates, anywhere, instantly.

Calculate rates based on your customer’s location with granularity, including state, county, city, and district-level accuracy. Leverage our developer-friendly API directly, or use one of our integrations to get started in a snap!

Manage exemptions

Protect your business and prove compliance during audits by verifying your customers’ exemption certificates.

Collect, validate, and verify certificates while allowing customers to apply them at checkout. Numeral’s tools streamline certificate collection, storage, renewals, and validation, making compliance easy.

Simple integrations and end-to-end tax support as your business grows.

data.html:
We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
,
Founder, immi

I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.

Jesse Hiss
,
Founder, Fresh Sends

It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.

Adrian Zhang
,
Co-founder, The Woobles

As a founder, sales tax for my SaaS business was the last thing I wanted to think about. Numeral made it dead simple for Archive to stay compliant across multiple jurisdictions. Plus, their developer experience is thoughtful and built with craft.

Paul Benigeri
,
CEO, Archive

Numeral tailors its solution to each client’s needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.

Jason Wong
,
Founder, Doe Lashes

Sales tax compliance is a consistent frustration for my Series A & B SaaS clients. As a busy CFO, I want to spend my energy on strategic work, not compliance. With Numeral, I can delegate away the minutia of state tax compliance.

Hari Seshadri
,
CEO, Fractional
